attributes.action: apologise to all Veterans for being 10 minutes late to the 65th D-Day Celebrations and for mis-pronouncing Omaha beach as 'Obama Beach'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. According to the terms and conditions the petitions website does not recognise requests for an apology as a proper action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
